text.section:
A financial institution shall compute its net earnings:
based on the accounting period used as its fiscal year; and
subject to the modifications required under this section, in the manner that a corporation computes, for purposes of the income tax, the Maryland modified income.

A financial institution shall subtract from its net earnings computed under subsection (a) of this section interest expense incurred to purchase or carry a bond as defined in subsection (b)(5) of this section.
